channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ipsos MRBI for The Irish Times, 6–8 May 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Fine Gael (EPP): 32.4–37.2%
  • Fianna Fáil (ALDE): 28.8–33.5%
  • Sinn Féin (GUE/NGL): 17.2–21.2%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 7.1–9.9%
  • Solidarity–People Before Profit (GUE/NGL): 0.1–0.7%
  • Social Democrats (*): 0.1–0.7%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 3.8–6.0%
  • Renua Ireland (*): 0.1–0.7%
  • Independent Alliance (*): 0.1–0.7%
  • Independents (*): 0.1–0.7%
